Gorilla Tagged V2: The Evolution of Jungle Adventure

Gorilla Tagged V2 is an exhilarating fan-made sequel to the original Gorilla Tag, designed for fans who crave more action, exploration, and freedom in their virtual jungle playground. Building upon the success of its predecessor, Gorilla Tagged V2 takes the core elements that made the original game so much fun—free-flowing movement, immersive multiplayer environments, and fast-paced tag mechanics—and enhances them with new features, improved graphics, and a broader range of gameplay options.

Enhanced Movement and Physics
In Gorilla Tagged V2, the movement system has been revamped, allowing players to experience more responsive and fluid controls. The game's signature physics-based locomotion remains at the heart of the gameplay, but now with smoother transitions, better wall-scaling mechanics, and enhanced air control. Players can leap from tree to tree with greater precision or vault over obstacles, making each chase more intense and unpredictable.
